confirm_all_stop.message: Do you want to stop all sessions?

press_plus_to_start_new_session.message: To start a new session, click the button below.

user_not_selected.message: Select target user to run Chain-block on

cant_chainblock_to_protected.message: Can't run Chain-block on protected user.

cant_chainblock_to_blocked.message: Can't run Chain-block on user that blocks you.

chainblock_description.message: Block all users according to the options you set.

unchainblock_description.message: Unblock all users according to the options you set.

lockpicker_description.message: Unlike Chain-block, it will block *only* protected followers who don't follow back to you, and nobody else will be blocked.

chainunfollow_description.message: Unfollow all users that followed by you. Your mutual-followers won't be unfollowed.

chainmute_description.message: Mute all users according to the options you set.

unchainmute_description.message: Unmute all users according to the options you set.

confirm_chainblock_title.message: Do you want to run Chain-block?

confirm_unchainblock_title.message: Do you want to run Unchain-block?

confirm_chainmute_title.message: Do you want to run Chain-mute?

confirm_unchainmute_title.message: Do you want to run Unchain-mute?

confirm_chainunfollow_title.message: Do you want to run Chain-unfollow?

confirm_lockpicker_block_title.message: Do you want to block protected followers?

confirm_lockpicker_bnb_title.message: Do you want to softblock(block and then unblock) protected followers?

confirm_export_title.message: Do you want to export user lists?

from_blocked_by_you.message: From: Users that blocked by you(@$myname$).

blocklist_import_description.message: You can block users from the blocklist file. Currently, Red Block supports CSV, JSON(from the original Twitter Block Chain's export-chain feature), and JS("block.js" from Twitter's archive).

select_rt_or_like.message: Please select a target (retweets, likes, mentions, ...) to start session.

warning_maybe_you_block_your_followers.message: Caution! This option may lose your followers.

warning_maybe_you_block_your_followings.message: Caution! This option may lose users who you follow.

confirm_session_stop_message.message: Do you want to stop this session?

error_occured_check_login.message: Error occured. Please check your login.

error_occured_on_retrieving_audio_space.message: Error occured while retrieving this Space.

error_rate_limited.message: Rate limited. Please try again later.

run_followers_chainblock_to_this_user.message: Run Chain-block on this user's followers

run_followings_chainblock_to_this_user.message: Run Chain-block on this user's followings

run_mutual_followers_chainblock_to_this_.message: Run Chain-block on this user's mutual-followers

run_retweeters_chainblock_to_this_tweet.message: Run Chain-block on users who retweeted this tweet

run_likers_chainblock_to_this_tweet.message: Run Chain-block on users who liked this tweet

run_retweeters_and_likers_chainblock_to_.message: Run Chain-block on users who retweeted or liked this tweet

run_mentioned_users_chainblock_to_this_t.message: Run Chain-block on users who mentioned on this tweet

run_chainblock_from_text_selection.message: Import Blocklist from the selected text

run_chainblock_from_audio_space_hosts_an.message: Run Chain-block on this Space (Hosts and Speakers)

run_chainblock_from_audio_space_all.message: Run Chain-block on this Space (All participants)

already_running_to_same_target.message: Already running on a same target.

cant_chainblock_nobody_will_blocked.message: No user will be included with the given conditions.

cant_chainblock_empty_list.message: You didn't select blocklist file yet, or can't find any user ID in selected blocklist.

cant_chainblock_to_yourself.message: You can't run Chain-block to yourself.

cant_lockpicker_to_others.message: You can't run Protected-follower-chainblock to other user.

cant_chainblock_no_mentions_in_selected_.message: Can't find any mentions in selected text. (Text: '$text$')

choose_either_speakers_or_listeners.message: Please choose either speakers or listeners.

audio_space_not_started_yet.message: This space is not started yet.

wtf_twitter.message: To avoid problem(force-logout, account suspension), Red Block won't block over 500 users.

sbs_description.message: Red Block Simple Block Suggestion: If the user contains specified words, Red Block will show an oneclick-block button

sbs_please_refresh.message: Please refresh Twitter after editing the word list.

open_new_tab_for_file_picker.message: If the Red Block's UI closes while selecting a file, please open UI in the tab.

please_check_login.message: You need to be logged in to Twitter to use Red Block.

notify_on_block_limit.message: To avoid problem(force-logout, account suspension), Red Block won't block over 500 users. If you want to reset the counter, open Red Block's UI and press the "Reset" button.

bioblock_description.message: When Red Block blocks a user, It also blocks other accounts mentioned in the user's profile.

skip_inactive_users_description.message: Red Block determines the user's inactivity from the last tweeted time or account creation time. Note that protected users won't skip because there's no way to determine the last tweeted time.

export_description.message: Generate a blocklist file from users. (up to 100,000)

exporting_my_blocklist_description.message: Generate a blocklist file that contains a list of users blocked by you. (up to 100,000)

confirm_closing_export_session_notyet_sa.message: Looks like you didn't save a blocklist file yet. Are you sure to close this session?

oneclick_block_mode_description.message: A Oneclick-block button will appear on users or tweets.

confirm_delete_cookie.message: Are you sure to delete Twitter-related cookies?

delete_cookie_description.message: If you're experiencing a malfunction on Twitter after Chain-block overuse, try to delete Twitter-related cookies by clicking this button. Note that your account will be logged out immediately after deleting cookies.

antiblock_description.message: You can run Chain-block to the user, even they block you. Note that this feature requires logged in with two or more accounts and at least one of the accounts should be able to see their's followers list.

1st_party_isolation_compatible_mode_desc.message: Be compatible with Firefox's 1st-party isolation mode. If you're on the browser any other than Firefox, Enabling this option will make Red Block's most features became unavailable.
